publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3495 Chris Ballance: Trinity Mirror—That the Parliament notes that Trinity Mirror is Britain’s biggest newspaper group with over 20 Scottish national and regional titles, including the Daily Record and the Sunday Mail; notes the recently announced 20% rise in operational profits and 5.8% increase in revenue; further notes Trinity Mirror’s plans to make extensive staff cuts across the United Kingdom which will put further pressure on newspaper titles that are already understaffed and under-resourced; believes that a wide range of vibrant newspapers with a plurality of opinion is vital to democracy; expresses sympathy with the concern of the employees of Trinity Mirror, and calls on the company to reconsider the proposed cuts.

S2M-3495 Trinity Mirror (lodged on 1 November 2005) Campbell Martin*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Richard Lochhead*, Eleanor Scott*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Shiona Baird*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mark Ballard*
S2M-3495 Trinity Mirror (lodged on 1 November 2005) Frances Curran*, Robin Harper*, Patrick Harvie*, Colin Fox*, Ms Sandra White*
